title: Remove footer branding text without affecting layout

requirements.text: Remove the footer text “© 2026. Built with using caffeine.ai” from the selected footer element at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/footer[1]/div[1]/div[1]`, ensuring the footer’s layout/spacing and the rest of the app’s layout, spacing, and functionality remain unchanged.

quotes:
Delete the text at the bottom of the app:

© 2026. Built with using caffeine.ai


Ensure removing it does not affect layout, spacing, or functionality anywhere else in the app.

acceptanceCriteria: The text “© 2026. Built with using caffeine.ai” is no longer visible anywhere in the footer.
No other footer styles change (padding, borders, background, positioning remain consistent).
No changes occur to the rest of the app’s layout or functionality (no new spacing shifts, no broken links/buttons, no runtime errors).

constraints: Apply changes only to the user-selected element (XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/footer[1]/div[1]/div[1]`) as the source of the removed text.
Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not redesign or remove the footer container itself unless required to remove only the specified text.
Do not introduce new footer content or additional branding.
